typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> australiacities
source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		POP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> population
australiacities, population join(australiacities@ID_CITY == population@ID_CITY,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(toInteger(SALES)>50) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(desc(SALES, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> outputdataflow1

parameters{
	parameter1 as string,
	parameter2 as string
}
source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> australiacities2
australiacities2 derive(LOAD_DATETIME = $parameter1,
		USER = $parameter2) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		NO_STATE as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PRODUCTCATEGORY.txt'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		NO_STATE as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ID_CITY'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ID_CITY'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source.sqlReaderQuery: select avg(random_number) as avg_random_number, min(random_number) as min_random_number, max(random_number) as max_random_number, stdev(random_number) as stdev_random_number from random_number
